article: south african president nelson mandela and the leaders of zimbabwe and botswana began emergency talks here tuesday to consider the crisis in lesotho which has been paralysed by a royal coup and a two-day protest strike .
abstract: three presidents begin meeting to consider next step in lesotho crisis
